pkgmetadata.longdescription: Ecometric Models of TraitEnvironment Relationships at the Community Level // Provides a framework for modeling relationships between functional traits and both quantitative and qualitative environmental variables at the community level. It includes tools for trait binning, likelihood-based environmental estimation, model evaluation, fossil projection into modern ecometric space, and result visualization. For more details see Vermillion et al. (2018) doi:10.1007/978-3-319-94265-0_17, Polly et al. (2011) doi:10.1098/rspb.2010.2233 and Polly and Head (2015) doi:10.1017/S1089332600002953.
